102.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): The Day the horn is blown, and We gather the criminals on that Day white eyed.

103.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They whisper among themselves: "You have only been away for a period of ten."

104.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): We are fully aware of what they say, for the best among them will say: "No, you have only been away for a day."

105.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And they ask you about the mountains, so say: "My Lord will annihilate them completely."

106.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "Then He will leave it as a smooth plain."

107.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "You will not see in it any crookedness or curves."

108.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): On that Day, they will follow the caller, there is no crookedness to him. And all voices will be humbled for the Almighty, you will not be able to hear except whispers.

109.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): On that Day, no intercession will be of help, except for he whom the Almighty allows and accepts what he has to say.

110.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He knows their present and their future, and they do not have any of His knowledge.

111.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And the faces shall be humbled for the Eternal, the Living. And whoever carried wickedness with him has failed.

112.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And whoever does any good works, while he is a believer, then he should not fear injustice nor being given less than his due.

113.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And it was such that We sent it down an Arabic revelation, and We dispatched in it the warnings, perhaps they will become aware or it will cause them to remember.

114.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Then High above all is God, the King, the True. And do not be hasty with the Qur'an before its inspiration is completed to you, and say: "My Lord, increase my knowledge."

115.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And We had entrusted to Adam from before, but he forgot, and We did not find in him the will power.

116.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And We said to the angels: "Yield to Adam." They all yielded except for Satan, he refused.

117.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So We said: "O Adam, this is an enemy to you and your mate. So do not let him take you out from the paradise, else you will have hardship."

118.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "You will have in it that you will not go hungry nor need clothes."

119.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "And you will have in it that you will not go thirsty nor suffer from heat."

120.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): But the devil whispered to him, he said: "O Adam, shall I lead you to the tree of immortality and a kingdom which will not waste away?"

121.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So they both ate from it, and their bodies became apparent to them, and they began to place leaves on themselves from the paradise. Adam had disobeyed his Lord, and had gone astray.

122.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Then his Lord recalled him, and He forgave him, and gave guidance to him.

123.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He said: "Descend from this, all of you, for you are enemies to one another. So, when My guidance comes to you, then, whoever follows My guidance, he will not go astray nor suffer."

124.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "And whoever turns away from My remembrance, then he will have a miserable life, and We will raise him blind on the Day of Resurrection."

125.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He said: "My Lord, you have raised me blind while I used to be able to see?"

126.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He said: "It was the same when Our revelations came to you, you forgot them, and similarly today you will be forgotten."

127.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And it is such that We recompense he who transgresses, and did not believe in the revelations of his Lord. And the retribution of the Hereafter is more severe and more lasting.

128.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Is it not a guide to them how many generations We had destroyed before them, which they are walking now in their homes? In that are signs for the people of understanding.

129.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And had it not been for a word already given by your Lord, they would have been held to account immediately.

130.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So be patient to what they are saying and glorify the grace of your Lord before the rising of the sun, and before its setting, and at the approach of the night - you shall glorify - and at parts of the day, perhaps you may be content.

131.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And do not crave with your eyes what We have bestowed upon some couples from them; the flower of the worldly life; so as to test them in it; and the provision of your Lord is better and more lasting.

132.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And instruct your family to the contact prayer, and be patient for it. We do not ask you for provision, for We provide for you. And the ending will be for righteousness.

133.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And they said: "If only he would bring us a sign from his Lord!" Did not proof come to them from what is in the previous scripts?

134.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And if We had destroyed them with a retribution before this, they would have said: "Our Lord, if only You had sent us a messenger so we could follow Your revelations before we are humiliated and shamed!"

135.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Say: "All are waiting, so wait, and you will come to know who are the people upon the even path and who are guided."

1.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): The judgment for the people has come near, while they are turning away unaware.

2.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): When a reminder comes to them from their Lord that is recent, they listen to it while playing.

3.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Their hearts are preoccupied, and those who are wicked confer privately: "Is he not but a human being like you? Would you accept this magic while you know?"

4.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Say: "My Lord knows what is said in the heavens and on the earth, and He is the Hearer, the Knower."

5.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They said: "No, these are just bad dreams; no, he made it up; no, he is a poet. So let him bring us a sign like those who were sent before.

6.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): None of the towns which We destroyed before them had believed. Will they be the ones who believe?

7.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And We did not send before you except men whom We inspired to. So ask the people of the Reminder if you do not know.

8.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And We did not make for them bodies that do not need to eat, nor were they immortal.

9.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Then We fulfilled the promise to them, so We saved them and whom We pleased, and We destroyed those who transgressed.

10.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): We have sent down to you a Book in which is your remembrance. Do you not comprehend?

11.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And how many a town have We destroyed because it was wicked, and We established after them a different people?

12.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So it was that when they perceived Our power, they were running from it.

13.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "Donot run, and come back to that which you were living lavishly in and your homes; so that you will be questioned."

14.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They said: "Woe to us, we have been wicked!"

15.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So that remained their cry until We took them all, and they became still.

16.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndWe did not create the heavens and the earth and what is between them for entertainment.

17.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): If We wanted to be amused, We could have done so from what is already with Us, if that is what We wished to do.

18.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): No,We cast with the truth upon the falsehood, so it disrupts it, and then it retreats. And woe to you for what you have described.

19.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andto Him is whoever is in the heavens and on the earth. And those who are near Him are not too proud to serve Him, nor do they complain.

20.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They glorify in the night and the day, they do not cease.

21.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Or have they taken earthly gods who can resurrect?

22.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): If there were gods in them except for God, then they would have been ruined. Glory be to God, the Lord of the Throne from what they describe.

23.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He is not questioned about what He does, while they will be questioned.

24.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Or have they taken gods besides Him? Say: "Bring your proof. This is a reminder of those with me and a reminder of those before me." But, most of them do not know the truth, so they turn away.

25.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndWe did not send any messenger before you except that We inspired him that: "There is no god except Me, so serve Me."

26.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andthey said: "The Almighty has taken a son!" Be He glorified, they are all but honored servants.

27.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They do not speak ahead of Him, and on His command they act.

28.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He knows their present and their future, and they cannot intercede unless it is for those whom He is pleased with. And, from His concern, they are worried.

29.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andwhoever of them says: "I am a god besides Him," then that person We will punish with Hell. It is such that We punish the wicked.

30.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Have those who rejected not seen that the heavens and the earth were one piece, so We split them apart? And that We have made from the water everything that lives. Will they not believe?

31.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndWe made on the earth stabilizers so that it would not tumble with you, and We made in it wide paths that they may be guided.

32.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndWe made the sky a protective ceiling; and yet, from its signs they are turning away!

33.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And He is the One who has created the night and the day, and the sun and the moon, each swimming in an orbit.

34.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndWe did not give immortality to any human being that came before you. If you are going to die, would they be immortal?

35.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Every soul will taste death. And We burden you with evil and good as a test, and it is to Us that you will return.

36.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andwhen those who reject see you, they take you for mockery: "Is this the one who speaks about your gods!" While in the remembrance of the Almighty they are rejecters!

37.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Man has been created from haste. I will show you My signs, so do not be hasty.

38.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andthey say: "When will this promise come to pass if you are truthful?"

39.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): If only those who reject knew, that they will not be able to ward off the fire from their faces, nor from their backs, nor will they be helped.

40.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): No,it will come to them suddenly. And they will not be able to turn it away, nor will they be delayed.

41.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andmessengers before you were mocked, but those who ridiculed were then surrounded by that which they mocked!

42.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Say: "Who can protect you during the night and the day from the Almighty?" No, they are turning away from the remembrance of their Lord.

43.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Or do they have gods that will protect them from Us? They cannot help themselves, nor can they be protected from Us.

44.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): It was Us who gave luxury to these and their fathers, until they grew old with age. Do they not see that We come to the land and reduce it from its edges? Will they be able to win?

45.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Say: "I am merely warning you with the inspiration." But the deaf do not hear the call when they are being warned.

46.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andif a trace of the torment of your Lord touches them, they will say: "Woe to us, we have been wicked!"

47.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndWe place the balances of justice for the Day of Resurrection, so that no soul will be wronged in the least. Even if it was the weight of a mustard seed, We will bring it. And We are enough as a Reckoner.

48.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndWe had given Moses and Aaron the Criterion, a shining light, and reminder for the righteous.

49.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Those who are concerned towards their Lord in the unseen, and they are weary of the Hour.

50.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andthis is a blessed reminder which We have sent down. Will you be deniers of it?

51.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andbefore that We gave Abraham his understanding, and We were aware of him.

52.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): As he said to his father and people: "What are these images to which you are devoted?"

53.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They said: "We found our fathers worshipping them."

54.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He said: "You and your fathers have been clearly misguided."

55.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They said: "Have you come to us with the truth, or are you simply playing?"

56.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He said: "No, your lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, the One who initiated them. And I bear witness to such."

57.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "And by God, I will plan against your statues after you have gone away and given your backs."

58.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So he broke them into pieces except for the biggest of them, so that they may turn to him.

59.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They said: "Who has done this to our gods? He is surely one of the wicked."

60.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They said: "We heard a young man mentioning them. He was called Abraham."

61.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They said: "Bring him before the eyes of the people so that they may be witness."

62.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They said: "Did you do this to our gods O Abraham?"

63.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He said: "It was the biggest one of them here who did it, so ask them, if they do speak!"

64.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So they turned and said to themselves: "It is indeed ourselves who have been wicked!"

65.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Then they returned to their old ideas: "You know that they do not speak!"

66.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He said: "Do you serve besides God that which does not benefit you at all nor harm you?"

67.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "I am fed-up of you and to what you serve besides God! Do you not comprehend?"

68.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They said: "If you are to do anything, then burn him, and give victory to your gods."

69.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): We said: "O fire, be cool and safe upon Abraham."

70.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andthey wanted to plan against him, but We made them the losers.

71.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndWe saved him and Lot to the land which We have blessed in for the worlds.

72.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndWe granted him Isaac and, as an addition, Jacob. And each of them We made a good doer.

73.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndWe made them leaders who guide by Our command, and We inspired them to do good works and hold the contact prayer and contribute towards purification, and they were in service to Us.

74.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndLot, We gave him wisdom and knowledge, and We saved him from the town that used to do vile things. They were a people of evil, wicked.

75.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndWe admitted him into Our mercy. He was of the good doers.

76.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndNoah when he called out before that, thus We responded to him, and We saved him and his family from the great distress.

77.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndWe granted him victory against the people who denied Our revelations. They were a people of evil, so We drowned them all.

78.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndDavid and Solomon, when they gave judgment in the case of the crop that was damaged by the sheep of the people, and We were witness to their judgment.

79.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So We gave Solomon the correct understanding, and both of them We have given wisdom and knowledge. And We commissioned the mountains with David to praise, and the birds. This is what We did.

80.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndWe taught him the making of armor for you to protect you from your enemy. Are you then thankful?

81.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andto Solomon the gusting winds run by his command all the way to the land which We have blessed in. And We were aware of everything.

82.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andfrom the devils are those who dive for him, and they perform other tasks, and We were guardian over them.

83.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndJob when he called his Lord: "I have been afflicted with harm, and you are the Most Merciful of those who show mercy!"

84.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So We answered him, and We removed what was afflicting him, and We brought him back his family and others with them as a mercy from Us and a reminder to those who serve.

85.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndIshmael and Enoch and Isaiah, all of them were patient.

86.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndWe admitted them in Our mercy, they were of the good doers.

87.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andthe one with 'N,' when he went off in anger, and he thought that We would not be able to take him. Then he called out in the darkness: "There is no god except You! Glory be to You, I was of the wicked!"

88.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So We responded to him and We saved him from distress. And it is such that We save the faithful.

89.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): AndZachariah when he called out to his Lord: "My Lord, do not leave me without an heir, and You are the best inheritor."

90.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So We responded to him, and We granted him John, and We cured his wife. They used to hasten to do good, and they would call to Us in joy and in fear. And of Us they were reverent.

91.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andthe one who protected her chastity, so We blew into her from Our Spirit, and We made her and her son a sign for the worlds.

92.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): This is your nation, one nation, and I am your Lord so serve Me.

93.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andthey disputed in the matter among themselves. Each of them will be returned to Us.

94.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So whoever does good works and he is a believer, then his efforts will not be rejected and We will record it for him.

95.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And it is forbidden for a town that We destroy, that they return!

96.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Until Gog and Magog is opened, and from every elevated place they will race forth.

97.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andthe promise of truth draws near. Then, when it is seen by the eyes of those who rejected: "Woe to us, we have been oblivious to this. Indeed, we were wicked!"

98.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Both you and what you serve besides God shall be fuel for Hell; you will enter it.

99.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): If these had been gods, then they would not have entered it! And all will abide therein.

100.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They will be breathing heavily in it, and they will not be heard therein.

101.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): As for those who deserved good from Us, they will be removed far away from it.

102.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Theyshall not hear the slightest sound from it, and they will be in what their soul desires abiding therein.

103.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): The great horror will not sadden them, and the angels will receive them: "This is your Day which you have been promised."

104.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): On the Day when We roll up the heavens like the scroll of a book is rolled up. As We initiated the first creation, so shall We return it. It is a promise of Ours that We will do this.

105.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And We have written in the Psalms: "After the remembrance, that the earth will be inherited by My servants who do good."

106.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): In this is a proclamation for a people who serve.

107.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And We have not sent you except as a mercy to the worlds.

108.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Say:"It is inspired to me that your god is but One god, so will you submit to Him?"

109.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So if they turn away, then say: "I have given you notice sufficiently, and I do not know if what you are promised is near or far."

110.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "He knows that which is spoken publicly and He knows that which you keep secret."

111.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "Andfor all I know, it may be a test for you and an enjoyment for a while."

112.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He said: "My Lord, judge with the truth. And our Lord, the Almighty, is sought for what you describe."

1.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Opeople, be aware of your Lord, for the quaking of the Hour is a terrible thing

2.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): The moment you see it, every nursing mother will leave her suckling child, and every pregnant one will miscarry, and you will see the people intoxicated while they are not intoxicated, but the retribution of God is most severe

3.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And from the people is he who argues regarding God without knowledge, and he follows every rebellious devil

4.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Itwas decreed for him that any who follow him, he will mislead him, and guide him to the retribution of Fire

5.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): O people, if you are in doubt as to the resurrection, then We have created you from dust, then from a seed, then from an embryo, then from a fetus developed and undeveloped so that We make it clear to you. And We settle in the wombs what We wish to an appointed time, then We bring you out a child, then you reach your maturity, and of you are those who will pass away, and of you are those who are sent to an old age where he will not be able to learn any new knowledge after what he already has. And you see the land still, but when We send down the water to it, it vibrates and grows, and it brings forth of every lovely pair

6.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): That is because God is the truth, and He gives life to the dead, and He is capable of all things

7.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And the Hour is coming, there is no doubt in it, and God will resurrect those who are in the graves

8.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And from the people are those who argue regarding God with no knowledge nor guidance nor enlightening Book

9.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Bending his side to misguide from the path of God. He will have humiliation in the world and We will make him taste on the Day of Resurrection the retribution of burning

10.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): That is for what your hands have delivered, and God does not wrong the servants

11.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andfrom the people there is he who serves God nervously. So if good comes to him, he is content with it; and if an ordeal comes to him, he makes an about-face. He has lost this world and the Hereafter. Such is the clear loss

12.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He calls upon besides God what will not harm him and what will not benefit him. Such is the far straying

13.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He calls on those who harm him more than they benefit him. What a miserable patron, and what a miserable companion

14.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Godadmits those who believe and do good works to estates with rivers flowing beneath them. God does as He wishes

15.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Whoever thinks that God will not grant him victory in this world and the Hereafter, then let him extend his reasons to the heavens, then let him cease and see whether this action has removed the cause of his anger

16.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andas such, We have sent down clear revelations, and God guides whoever He wishes

17.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Surely those who believe; and those who are Jewish, and the Sabians, and the Nazarenes, and the Majoos; and those who were polytheists; God will separate between them on the Day of Resurrection. For God is witness over all things

18.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Didyou not see that to God yields what is in the heavens and what is on the earth, and the sun and the moon and the stars and the mountains and the trees and what moves, and many of the people, and many who have deserved the retribution. And whoever God disgraces, then none can honor him. God does what He pleases

19.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Here are two opponents who have disputed regarding their Lord; as for those who rejected, outer garments made from fire are cut out for them, and boiling water is poured from above their heads.

20.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): It melts the inside of their bellies and their skin.

21.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andthey will have hooked rods of iron

22.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Every time they want to escape the anguish, they are returned to it. Taste the retribution of the burning!

23.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Godwill admit those who believe and do good works to estates with rivers flowing beneath them, wherein they will be adorned with bracelets of gold and pearls, and their garments will be of silk

24.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andthey are guided to the good sayings, and guided to the path of the Praiseworthy

25.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Surely, those who have rejected and repel from the path of God, and from the Restricted Temple that We have made for the people – for the one devoted therein and the one who visits it – and whoever inclines to evil action in it, We will let them taste a painful retribution

26.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And We have appointed to Abraham the location of the Sanctuary: "Do not set up anyone with Me, and purify My Sanctuary for those who visit, and those who are standing, and the kneeling, the prostrating.

27.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andcall out to the people with the Pilgrimage, they will come to you walking and on every transport, they will come from every deep enclosure

28.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So that they may witness benefits for themselves, and mention the name of God in the appointed days over what He has provided for them of the animal livestock. So eat from it and feed the needy and the poor

29.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Then let them complete their duties and fulfill their vows, and let them traverse at the ancient Sanctuary

30.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Thus, and whoever honors the restrictions of God, then it is better for him with His Lord. And the livestock has been made lawful for you; except what is being recited to you; so avoid the taint of idols and avoid saying false statements

31.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Monotheists to God, not setting up anything with Him. And whoever sets up partners with God, then it is as if he has fallen from the sky and the birds snatch him or the wind takes him to a place far off

32.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Thus, and whoever honors the symbols of God, then it is from the piety of the hearts

33.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): In them are benefits to an appointed time, then their place is to the ancient Sanctuary

34.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andfor every nation We have established rites that they may mention the name of God over what He has provided for them of the animal livestock. Your god is One god; submit to Him and give good tidings to those who obey

35.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Those who, when God is mentioned, their hearts reverence, and they are patient to what befalls them, and they hold the contact prayer, and from what We provide them they spend

36.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And the plump livestock, We have made them for you to be among the symbols of God; you will have benefit in them. So mention the name of God upon them in succession; then, once their sides have become still, you may eat from them and feed with them the poor and the needy. It was thus that We have made them in service to you, that you may be thankful

37.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Neither their meat nor their blood reaches God, but what reaches Him is the righteousness from you. It was thus that He made them in service to you, so that you may magnify God for what He has guided you to, and give news to the good doers

38.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Goddefends those who believe. God does not love any betrayer, rejecter

39.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Permission has been given to those who are being fought - for they have been wronged. And God is able to give them victory

40.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): The ones who were driven out of their homes without justice, except that they said: "Our Lord is God!" And if it were not for God defending the people against themselves, then many places of gathering, and markets, and contact prayers, and temples where the name of God is frequently mentioned, would have been destroyed. God will give victory to those who support Him. God is Powerful, Noble.

41.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Those whom, if We allow them to have authority in the land, they hold the contact prayer, and they contribute towards purification, and they prohibit vice. And to God is the conclusion of all matters

42.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andif they deny you, then before them the people of Noah and 'Aad and Thamud had also denied

43.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Andthe people of Abraham and the people of Lot

10.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And the heart of Moses' mother became anxious, that she nearly revealed her identity. But We strengthened her heart, so that she would be of the believers

11.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And she said to his sister: "Follow his path." So she watched him from afar, while they did not notice

12.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And We forbade him from accepting all the nursing mothers. Then his sister said: "Shall I lead you to a household that can nurse him for you, and take good care of him?

13.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Thus, We returned him to his mother, so that she may be pleased and not be saddened, and to let her know that the promise of God is the truth. However, most of them do not know

14.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And when he reached his independence and was established, We bestowed him with wisdom and knowledge. We thus reward the good doers

15.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And he entered the city unexpectedly, without being noticed by the people. He found in it two men who were fighting, one was from his clan, and the other was from that of his enemy. So the one who was from his clan called on him for help against his enemy, whereby Moses punched him, killing him. He said: "This is from the work of the devil; he is an enemy that clearly misleads.

16.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He said: "My Lord, I have wronged my soul, so forgive me." He then forgave him, for He is the Forgiver, the Merciful

17.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He said: "My Lord, for what blessings you have bestowed upon me, I will never be a supporter for the criminals.

18.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So he spent the night in the city, afraid and watchful. Then the one who sought his help yesterday, was asking again for his help. Moses said to him: "You are clearly a trouble maker.

19.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): But when he was about to strike their common enemy, he said: "O Moses, do you want to kill me, as you killed that person yesterday? Obviously, you wish to be a tyrant on the earth; you do not wish to be of the righteous.

20.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And a man came running from the farthest part of the city, saying: "O Moses, the commanders are plotting to kill you, so leave immediately. I am giving you good advice.

21.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He exited the city, afraid and watchful. He said: "My Lord, save me from the wicked people.

22.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And as he traveled towards Midyan, he said: "Perhaps my Lord will guide me to the right path.

23.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): When he arrived at the watering hole of Midyan, he found a crowd of people watering, and he found two women waiting on the side. He said: "What is holding you back." They said: "We cannot draw water until the shepherds finish, and our father is an old man.
