Then, God sent down tranquility upon His messenger and the believers, and directed them to uphold the word of righteousness, and they were well entitled to it and worthy of it. And God is fully aware of all things

27.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): God has affirmed, that the vision of His messenger will come true: "You will enter the Restricted Temple, God willing, secure, with your heads shaven, and shortened - no longer in fear." Thus, He knew what you did not know, and He has appointed before this a conquest near at hand.

28.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He is the One who sent His messenger with the guidance and the system of truth, so that it would expose all other systems. And God is enough as a witness.

29.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Mohammed is the messenger of God, and those who are with him are severe against the rejecters, but merciful between themselves. You see them kneeling and prostrating, they seek the blessings and approval of God. Their distinction is in their faces, as a result of prostrating. Such is their example in the Torah. And their example in the Gospel is like a plant which shoots out and becomes strong and thick and it stands straight on its trunk, pleasing to the farmers. That He may enrage the rejecters with them. God promises those among them who believe and do good works a forgiveness and a great reward

49.SurahEnglishNames: The Private Apartments, The Inner Apartments, The Chambers

1.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): O you who believe, do not place your opinion above that of God and His messenger. And be aware of God. God is Hearer, Knowledgeable.

2.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): O you who believe, do not raise your voices above the voice of the prophet, nor shall you speak loudly to him as you would speak loudly to each other, lest your works become nullified while you do not perceive.

3.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Surely, those who lower their voices with the messenger of God, they are the ones whose hearts have been tested by God for righteousness. They have deserved forgiveness and a great recompense.

4.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Surely, those who call on you from behind the lodgings, most of them do not comprehend.

5.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And if they had only been patient until you came out to them, it would have been better for them. God is Forgiver, Merciful.

6.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): O you who believe, if a wicked person comes to you with any news, then you shall investigate it. Lest you harm a people out of ignorance, then you will become regretful over what you have done

7.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And know that among you is the messenger of God. If he were to obey you in many things, you would have deviated. But God made you love faith and He adorned it in your hearts, and He made you hate disbelief, wickedness, and disobedience. These are the rightly guided ones

8.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Such is the grace from God and a blessing. God is Knowledgeable, Wise

9.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And if two parties of believers battle with each other, you shall reconcile them; but if one of them aggresses against the other, then you shall fight the one aggressing until it complies with the command of God. Once it complies, then you shall reconcile the two groups with justice, and be equitable; for God loves those who are equitable

10.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): The believers are brothers; so reconcile between your brothers, and be aware of God, that you may receive mercy

11.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): O you who believe, let not any people ridicule other people, for they may be better than they. Nor shall any women ridicule other women, for they may be better than they. Nor shall you mock one another, or call each other names; miserable indeed is the name of wickedness after attaining faith. And anyone who does not repent, then these are the transgressors.

12.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): O you who believe, you shall avoid much suspicion, for some suspicion is sinful. And do not spy on one another, nor shall you backbite. Would any of you enjoy eating the flesh of his dead brother? You certainly would hate this. You shall observe God. God is Redeemer, Merciful.

13.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): O people, We created you from a male and female, and We made you into nations and tribes, that you may know one another. Surely, the most honorable among you in the sight of God is the most righteous. God is Knowledgeable, Expert

14.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): The Nomads said: "We believe." Say: "You have not believed; but you should say: 'We have submitted', for belief has not yet entered into your hearts." If you obey God and His messenger, He will not put any of your works to waste. God is Forgiver, Merciful

15.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Believers are those who believe in God and His messenger, then they became without doubt, and they strive with their money and their lives in the cause of God. These are the truthful ones.

16.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Say: "Are you teaching God about your system while God knows everything in the heavens and the earth? God is knowledgeable of all things."

17.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They think they are doing you a favor by having submitted! Say: "Do not think you are doing me any favors by your submission. For it is God who is doing you a favor that He has guided you to the faith, if you are being true."

18.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Surely, God knows all the unseen in the heavens and the earth; God is Seer of what you do

1.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Q, and the Qur'an of glory.

2.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Are they surprised that a warner has come to them from amongst them, so the rejecters said: "This is something strange!"

3.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "Can it be that when we are dead and we become dust, that we come back later?"

4.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): We know which of them has become consumed with the earth; and We have with Us a record which keeps track.

5.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused state.

6.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Did they not look to the heaven above them, how We built it, and adorned it, and how it has no openings?

7.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And the land We extended it, and placed in it stabilizers, and We gave growth in it to every kind of healthy pair.

8.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Something to see and a reminder for every pious servant.

9.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And We sent down from the sky blessed water, and We gave growth with it to gardens and grain that is harvested.

10.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And the palm trees, emerging with clustering fruit.

11.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): A provision for the servants, and We gave life with it to the land which was dead. Such is the resurrection.

12.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Before their denial was that of the people of Noah, and the dwellers of Al-Raas, and Thamud.

13.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And 'Aad, and Pharaoh, and the brethren of Lot.

14.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And the people of the Sycamore, and the people of Tubba`. All of them disbelieved the messengers, so the promise came to pass.

15.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Did We have any difficulty in making the first creation? No, they are in confusion about the next creation.

16.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And We have created man and We know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer to him than his jugular vein.

17.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): When the two receivers meet on the right and on the left.

18.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He does not utter a word except a watcher is constantly with him.

19.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And the moment of death came with truth: "This is what you have been trying to avoid!"

20.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And the horn is blown on the promised Day.

21.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And every soul is brought, being driven, and with a witness.

22.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "You were heedless of this, so now We have removed your veil, and your sight today is iron!"

23.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And his associate said: "Here is one who is a transgressor.

24.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "Cast in Hell every stubborn rejecter.

25.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "Denier of good, transgressor, doubter."

26.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "The one who has set up with God another god; so cast him into the severe retribution."

27.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): His associate said: "Our Lord, I did not corrupt him, but he was already far astray."

28.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He said: "Do not argue with each other before Me, I have already presented you with My promise."

29.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "The sentence will not be changed with Me, and I do not wrong the servants.

30.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): The Day We say to Hell: "Are you full?" And it says: "Is there not more?"

31.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And the Paradise is brought near to the righteous, not far off.

32.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): This is what you have been promised, for every obedient, steadfast

33.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Who is concerned towards the Almighty while unseen, and came with a repenting heart

34.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Enter it in peace. This is the Day of eternal life

35.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): In it they will have what they wish, and We have even more.

36.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And how many a generation before them have We destroyed? They were stronger in power, and they had dominated the land. Did they find any refuge?

37.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): In that is a reminder for whoever has a heart, or cares to listen while he is heedful.

38.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And We have created the heavens and the earth and what is between them in six days, and no fatigue touched Us.

39.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So be patient to what they are saying, and glorify the grace of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before the setting.

40.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And from the night glorify Him, and after prostrating.

41.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And listen to the Day when the caller will call from a near place.

42.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): The Day they hear the scream with the truth. That is the Day of coming out.

43.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): We are the Ones who give life and bring death, and to Us is the destiny.

44.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): The Day when the earth will rapidly crumble away from them; that will be a gathering which is easy for Us.

45.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): We are fully aware of what they say; and you are not a tyrant over them. So remind with the Qur'an those who fear My promise.

1.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): By the winds that blow.

2.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Carrying rain.

3.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Traveling easily.

4.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Distributing as commanded.

5.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): What you are being promised is true.

6.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And the Judgment will come to pass.

7.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): By the heaven that is woven.

8.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): You are saying what is different.

9.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): To mislead those who are misled.

10.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Woe to the deceitful.

11.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Who are in mischief, unaware.

12.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They ask: "When is the Day of Recompense?"

13.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): The Day they ordeal upon the Fire.

14.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "Taste this ordeal of yours; this is what you asked to be hastened."

15.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): The righteous are in gardens and springs.

16.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Receiving what their Lord has bestowed to them, for they were before that pious.

17.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They used to rarely sleep the whole night.

18.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And before dawn, they would seek forgiveness.

19.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): An in their money was a portion for the beggar and the needy.

20.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And on the earth are signs for those who comprehend.

21.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And within yourselves; do you not see?

22.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And in the heaven is your provision, and what you are promised.

23.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): By the Lord of the heaven and the earth, this is truth just as the fact that you speak.

24.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Has the narrative of the noble guests of Abraham come to you?

25.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): When they entered upon him, they said: "Peace." He said: "Peace to a people unknown!"

26.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Then he went to his family and brought a fat calf.

27.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He offered it to them, he said: "Do you not eat?"

28.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He then became fearful of them. They said: "Do not fear," and they gave him good news of a knowledgeable son.

29.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): His wife then approached in amazement. She slapped upon her face, and said: "A barren old woman!"

30.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They said: "It was such that your Lord has said. He is the Wise, the Knowledgeable."

31.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): He said: "What is your undertaking, O messengers?"

32.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They said: "We have been sent to a criminal people."

33.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "To send down upon them stones of clay."

34.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "Prepared by your Lord for the transgressors."

35.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): We then vacated from it all the believers.

36.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): But We only found in it one house of those who had submitted.

37.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And We left in it a sign for those who fear the painful retribution.

38.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And also Moses, for We sent him to Pharaoh with a clear authority.

39.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): But he and his camp turned away, and said: "A magician, or crazy."

40.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So We took him and his troops; We cast them into the sea, and he was to blame.

41.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And also 'Aad, for We sent upon them the barren wind.

42.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Anything that it came upon was utterly destroyed.

43.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And also Thamud, for it was said to them: "Enjoy for a while."

44.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): But they rebelled against the command of their Lord. So the lightning struck them while they were looking.

45.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They were unable to rise up, nor could they win.

46.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And the people of Noah before; they were a wicked people.

47.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And the heaven We constructed with resources, and We are expanding it.

48.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And the earth We furnished; so glory to the Makers.

49.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And of everything We created a pair, perhaps you may remember.

50.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So turn towards God. I am to you from Him a clear warner.

51.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And do not make any other god with God. I am to you from Him a clear warner.

52.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Likewise, when a messenger went to those before them, they said: "A magician, or crazy."

53.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Have they passed down this saying to each other? Indeed, they are a wicked people.

54.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So turn away from them; you will not be blamed.

55.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And remind, for the reminder benefits the believers.

56.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): I did not create the Jinn and mankind except to serve Me.

57.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): I need no provisions from them, nor do I need them to give food.

58.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): God is the Provider, the One with Power, the Supreme.

59.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): The transgressors will have the same fate as their previous friends; so let them not be hasty.

60.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): So woe to those who rejected from the Day that is waiting for them.

18.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Delighted by what their Lord has granted them; and their Lord has spared them the retribution of Hell.

23.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They will enjoy drinks therein, from which there is no nonsense, nor blame.

24.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): And around them will be children like protected pearls.

26.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): They said: "We used to be compassionate among our people."

27.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "God thus blessed us, and has spared us the agony of the fierce hot winds."

28.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): "We used to implore Him before; He is the Kind, the Merciful.

33.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Or do they say: "He made it all up"? No, they simply do not believe

35.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Or were they created from nothing? Or was it them who have created?

36.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): Or did they create the heavens and the earth? No, they do not comprehend.

48.[The Monotheist Group] (2013 Edition): You shall be patient for the judgment of your Lord, for you are in Our sights; and glorify the praise of your Lord when you rise.
